facts: The scene takes place in the cargo hold of an Antonov transport airplane
The cargo hold is filled with collector cars, each of which is extremely expensive and often, unique.
The boys (Alec, Oleg, Noah) are exploring the huge freight deck.
Caesar, the little dog, is traipsing along.
Alec, Oleg and Noah marvel at a stylish mixture of luxury and performance cars.
comm_style: Alec is one of Yuri's sons
Oleg is one of Yuri's sons
Noah is Jackson's and Kate's son
Kate is Jackson's ex wife and the mother of their two children, Noah and Lily.
Kate struggles to cope with the impending global catastrophe and her family’s desperate attempts to escape the devastating events unfolding around them.
Kate is currently dating dr Silberman
Tamara is Yuri's girlfriend
Tamara is a sweet, naive blonde who hopes for the best
Tamara is secretly in love with Sasha
Tamara plays a maternal role towards Yuri's children - Alec and Oleg
Sasha is a pilot who works for Yuri
Lilly is the seven-year-old daughter of Jackson and Kate
Lilly is the younger sister of Noah
Lilly tries to keep calm in the face of terrivle danger
Lilly deeply loves her mother and father and looks up to them for safety
Yuri is a Russian billionaire and former boxer
Yuri’s character is marked by his repeated catchphrase 'Good…', often uttered in a somewhat menacing or dismissive tone.
Yuri is a somewhat unsavory character, willing to prioritize his own family’s interests over the greater good
Jackson is driven by his love for his children and his desire to protect them
Jackson and Kate used to be married
Jackson attempts to reconnect with his daughter Lilly and his son Noah
goals: Alec and Oleg talk with Noah about cars
Alec and Oleg talk with Noah about divorced parents
Tamara asks Kate about her relationship with dr Silberman
Yuri talks to Jackson about how their wives start to like each other
Sasha announces that he will land the airplane in Hawaii to refuel
